sdata.e: People in such countries, especially the ASEAN countries, believe that the secret of Japan's remarkable economic growth is education.

sdata.e: And in many countries, where the animals are already under pressure because their homes are being destroyed by agriculture, things can get even worse.

sdata.e: The "Coalition of the Willing" is a phrase that refers to the countries that fought together against Iraq in the Iraq War.

sdata.j: ↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑国々↑↓|くにぐに|↓が↑失業↑↓しつぎょう↓↑問題↑↓もんだい↓に↑苦↑↓くる↓しんでいる。すなわちそこには↑将来↑↓しょうらい↓が↑保障↑↓ほしょう↓されず、↑人生↑↓じんせい↓という↑汽車↑↓きしゃ↓に↑乗↑↓の↓り↑遅↑↓おく↓れてしまう↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑若者↑↓わかもの↓↑達↑↓たち↓がいる。
sdata.e: There are many countries that are suffering unemployment. In other words, there are many young people that are not guaranteed a future and are late for the train called life.

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓を↑通↑↓つう↓じて、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑世界中↑↓せかいじゅう↓を↑旅↑↓たび↓して↑回↑↓まわ↓り、↑多種↑↓たしゅ↓↑多様↑↓たよう↓な↑国々↑↓|くにぐに|↓で↑働↑↓はたら↓くという、↑素晴↑↓すば↓らしい↑喜↑↓よろこ↓びを↑得↑↓え↓てきました。
sdata.e: Throughout my life, I've had the great pleasure of travelling all around the world and working in many diverse nations.
